query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CHECK, E.ACTSS AS ZZACTSS, CASE WHEN E.ACTSS ='02' AND E.EMNFR= '1∆¿' THEN '∞≠≥≤∆¿' WHEN E.ACTSS = '02' AND E.EMNFR = '2∆¿' THEN '∞≠∫œ∆¿' ELSE F.TEXT30 END AS TEAM, D.LIFNR, D.NAMET, -- A.TEMNO, E.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM, -- D.PERKEY, D.PERNO, D.NAMEE AS NAMEE, D.ENTER, ---¿‘ªÁ¿œ D.TYPE,
CASE WHEN D.POSIC = 'X' THEN '¥Î«•' WHEN D.POSIT = 'X' AND D.POSIC = 'X' THEN 'º“¿Â' WHEN D.POSIC = 'X' AND D.POSIE = 'X' THEN '¥Î«•' WHEN D.POSIC = 'X' AND D.POSIT = 'X' AND D.POSIE = 'X' THEN 'º“¿Â' WHEN D.POSIT = 'X' THEN 'º“¿Â' ELSE '¡˜ø¯' END AS GBN, D.GUBUN, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, D.INDIRECT, D.DIRECT
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS D LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS E ON D.MANDT = E.MANDT AND D.LIFNR = E.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0161 AS A ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = D.LIFNR AND A.PERNO = D.PERNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.J_1AACTT AS F ON D.MANDT = F.MANDT AND D.ACTSS = F.J_1AACT AND F.SPRAS = '3' WHERE D.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND D.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND D.ACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND E.ACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND E.EMNFR = '1∆¿'
AND E.EMNFR = '2∆¿'
AND D.DIRECT ='X'
-- --AND D.DIRECT ='X' --
